kw.name: Open Browser To Home Page
Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://automationexercise.com'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Ouvre le navigateur sur la page d'accueil

kw.name: Go To Products Page
Wait And Click
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css:[href='/products']'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Attend que l'élément soit cliquable puis clique

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'All Products'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Navigue vers la page produits

kw.name: Search Product
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Blue Top' into text field 'css:#search_product'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait And Click
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css:#submit_search'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Attend que l'élément soit cliquable puis clique

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Searched Products'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Recherche un produit par nom

kw.name: Verify Product Search Results
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Blue Top'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.msg: ${product_count} = 1
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
Vérifie que le produit recherché est affiché

kw.name: Run Keywords
Take Screenshot On Failure
Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
Prend une capture en cas d'échec

kw.name: Close Browser Session
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme le navigateur
Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.
